title: Makus
author: Makus
created_time: November 21, 2023, 08:26:02 AMLast edit: November 22, 2023, 02:02:26 PM by Makus
content: Good day my country people, compliment of the season. I carry one ogbonga advise come board today to share with my fellow bitcoiners. Normally we know how things hard generally no be only for our country but na for everywhere, and to even see food chop sef na by the grace of God. But I still gat advise say make we no fail to remember or forget say next year na the halving event go take place, and based on history the halving dey prove to boost the price of bitcoin, and the sweet part na be say even for those wey dem just like to do trading and not long term holding, the halving still dey bless dem. So my advise na be say make we no fail to buy bitcoin before the halving so that, by the end of next year we go dey guaranteed of say small thing add for our bitcoin investment and anything wey you like to do with am na your choice, but e for still good make we continue to hold for long term.Just as I been talk before, the country hard, the country hard, but that one no mean say make we sitdown look this opportunity pass our eyes, normally Bitcoin no be do or die but for those wey fit make this sacrifice, I believe say we no go regret am most especially for those wey fit do small long term holding, like from now until January of 2025. Also as we dey hold for this period make we no let the happiness of the season allow us to loose focus to sell our precious coin any how oo, and make we no still keep our private key and seed phrase any how, because if you keep am anyhow or you fail to backup, your coins go loss for good.This advise na mostly for the newbies, please be carefully who you tell about your bitcoin investment or holding.

comments.body: OP All of us are Nigerians and we know how people always want to see results before they will believe something and when we have seen other people meeting up on something that we were even adviced to do but you refuse now you start envying people that are making it. This life itself is a risk and until someone take certain risk that will change his/her life, it will be difficult to achieve success. Some of us here plays gamble and loses huge amount of money yet we still move on and see it as fun, How much more investing on a project that has recorded huge success since it was introduced. What other evidence do we need to persuade us to keep buying bitcoins as against the upcoming halving, my people this risk is worth taking as I will keep on buying and Hodling bitcoin till the upcoming halving.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: There are some people that will want to invest in Bitcoin with the FOMO, and this happens to them when they have seen the evidence in the profit that their friends have made from their investment in Bitcoin. That's when they will want to dive into the market and want to make some quick profit before exiting the market again with the little profit they have made. Taking risks is good, but taking them at the wrong time makes them more risky 😜. Like you have said, @OP, it will be more profitable to invest now that the market is not so bullish than to wait until after the halving and when the market has started to pump.

comments.author: Out of mind
comments.body: Bitcoin halving is going too happen next year, as we all know, people in all countries are waiting to see this halving. Bitcoin halving is a very happy time for investors because after the Bitcoin halving, it is not too late for a bull market to enter the Bitcoin market. Of course, we've seen in history that the Bitcoin market goes up a lot right after the halving, and it's highest ATH. If a person likes too trade then this can be another trap to lose money as trading is always risky. When you start trading in the market, if you have an idea about the market, u will face a lot of losses and lose money, so it is better to refrain from trading. If u plan for short term investment it may give you small profit for military period but not high profit. That's why u should stop trading and instead plan too invest for long term, it will give you high profit. When you invest Bitcoin before it halves and hold until the bull market comes, you are guaranteed too double your profits.
